name: ˟_0xThxxghtx1˟stopperceivingpeace...˟˟
description: Going back to the analogy of the fish, he lived in constant chaos, the sea, which never stops, always runs and moves, always rises and always falls, always lets live or takes away life; when a simple creature accustomed to chaos stops perceiving peace? The only way is to kill the chaos that surrounds him, I consider that one of the main reasons why people stop living happily, the chaos that surrounds them becomes peace, the change is over, the different is over, they simply remain stable in motionless water, unable to breathe, simply agonizing slowly in a constant chaos, but, how bad is this chaos?
